headline: A Look At S&P Global (SPGI) Valuation As Mobility Unit Spin Off And PMI Readings Draw Focus
summary: S&P Global (SPGI) is back in focus after outlining plans to spin off its Mobility unit under the new name Mobility Global, Inc., alongside fresh manufacturing PMI readings in the US and Canada. See our latest analysis for S&P Global. The spin off plan comes after a rough patch for the share price, with a 1 day share price return of 11.27% decline and a 7 day share price return of 11.10% decline. The 1 year total shareholder return of 8.18% decline contrasts with a 3 year total shareholder...
